channel.title: git on www.freniche.com
channel.description: Recent content in git on www.freniche.com

item.title: How To Recover A Deleted Git Stash
item.description: This is a scary story, not like a horror movie, but frightening enough to give any developer the shivers. The story goes a little something like this… A customer directs your attention to a bug you know you’ve solved, tested and shipped. You fixed it one day ago so the bug can’t be there, the customer must be wrong?! After running the application, waiting to not see the bug, it’s there again!

item.title: Maintain Your Sourcetree Bookmarks Throught Several Machines
item.description: If you use git, you probable have heard about SourceTree, the superb Atlassian git client, that solves 99% of your day-to-day git needs, connects to Github & Bitbucket repos and works on Mac and Windows. On top of that: it’s free, as in beer. Keep reading this post in the Mobile Jazz Blog
